tool_description: Generates realistic test responses for survey validation, testing logic flows, and data analysis preparation using various response patterns.

survey_id.description: Survey identifier to simulate responses for

response_count.description: Number of simulated responses to generate (1-1000)

response_pattern.description: Response pattern: random, positive_bias, negative_bias, neutral_bias, or realistic

completion_rate.description: Percentage of responses that are complete (0.1-1.0)

response_quality.description: Quality level: high, medium, or mixed (includes some low-quality responses)

error_messages: Survey not found: The specified survey_id does not exist
Invalid response count: Must be between 1 and 1000
Invalid response pattern: Must be one of [random, positive_bias, negative_bias, neutral_bias, realistic]
Invalid completion rate: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Invalid quality level: Must be one of [high, medium, mixed]
Simulation failed: Unable to generate responses due to survey configuration issues
usage: Provide survey_id and optionally configure response_count, response_pattern, completion_rate, include_demographics, and response_quality. Generates realistic test data for survey validation and analysis testing.

simulation_id.description: Unique identifier for the response simulation

average_completion_time.description: Average simulated completion time in seconds

data_export_url.description: URL to download simulated response data
